pbi.title: As a user, I want to export dashboard data to Excel
pbi.description: Add export functionality to dashboard that allows users to download current view as an Excel file
acceptance_criteria: Export button is visible on the dashboard
Clicking export generates an Excel file
Excel file includes all columns from the dashboard table
File name includes the date and time of export
Export preserves the current filter selections
Export process should be asynchronous with loading spinner
notes: Implement async export to prevent UI blocking

concerns: Potential performance complexity with large datasets
Need to clarify export error scenarios
Specific UI/UX design for export button not detailed

similar_work.title: Implement CSV Export for Analytics Dashboard
learnings: Implemented async file generation for large datasets
Added progress tracking for export process

similar_work.title: Export Functionality for Sales Reports
learnings: Filtered export based on current view parameters

past_decisions.title: Dashboard Export Strategy
past_decisions.decision: Use server-side file generation for large datasets
past_decisions.rationale: Prevent browser memory issues and improve performance
past_decisions.constraints: Max export size of 100,000 rows, timeout of 2 minutes

past_decisions.title: Excel Export Security Guidelines
past_decisions.constraints: Only export data user has view permissions for

risk_flags.message: Large datasets may cause significant memory overhead during Excel export process, requiring careful async handling
Unclear error management strategy for export failures, potential user experience disruption
Multiple Excel file format support requires additional library/transformation logic
Export button and progress tracking UI not explicitly defined, may require additional design clarification

suggestions: Define specific error scenarios for export process, including network interruptions, file size limits, and permission restrictions
Specify performance target for export process, such as generating Excel file within 5 seconds for datasets under 10,000 rows
Include explicit requirements for supporting multiple Excel file formats (.xlsx, .csv) with clear file naming conventions
Add user feedback mechanism to display export progress and provide download status notifications
Document fallback mechanism for export failure, including user-friendly error messages and potential retry options

risks.description: Performance complexity with large dataset Excel exports, potential memory overhead and slow processing
risks.mitigation: Implement server-side async processing, add pagination/chunking for large datasets, set clear file size limits

risks.description: Incomplete error handling strategy for export failures
risks.mitigation: Define comprehensive error scenarios, create user-friendly error messages, implement retry mechanisms

risks.description: Multiple Excel file format support requires complex transformation logic
risks.mitigation: Select robust Excel export library, standardize file format conversion, create modular export handlers

risks.description: Undefined UX design for export button and progress tracking
risks.mitigation: Create explicit UI/UX design specification for export functionality, include progress indicator

blocking_issues: No performance benchmark for async export
Incomplete UI/UX design for export button
warnings: Potential performance complexity with large datasets
recommendations: Define detailed error handling scenarios for export process
Create performance benchmark for async export functionality
Develop specific UI/UX design mockup for export button
Clarify handling of edge cases like export limit (5,000 rows)
Specify error messages and user communication for export failures
